CustomField.description: Optionally, select the Term that this Term is a part of. For example, if this Term is Fall Quarter 2020, the Parent Term might be 2020/2021 School Year.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Optionally, select the Term that this Term is a part of. For example, if this Term is Fall Quarter 2020, the Parent Term might be 2020/2021 School Year.
CustomField.label: Parent Term
